name.ch: 人工智慧與文化內容產業

goal.en: The use of AI in the cultural content industry has been flourishing. AI has introduced new approaches to the creative chain, including cultural creation, reproduction, dissemination, and approach methods. In addition to many musicians, filmmakers, and authors using machine learning to create their works, AI has opened up opportunities for non-professional artists, lowering the previous technical barriers to artistic creation. Simultaneously, AI algorithms assist creators in analyzing consumer demands and behavior, increasing the chances for their works to be seen. The application of AI technology indeed brings numerous new development opportunities for humanities students. From the above cases, it can be observed that skills such as art, history, literature, language, imagery, sound and music, and the expression of human emotions are crucial abilities required by these creative technologies, making them strengths of humanities disciplines. This course will start from the use cases of AI in the cultural content industry, intertwining with industry types, technology introductions, and practical examples. By combining case analysis with practical implementation, the course aims to provide students with a deeper understanding of the contemporary role and applications of artificial intelligence in the cultural content industry. The teacher‘s ultimate goals for the course are as follows: Students can create a printable picture book or explore local culture. a. The storyline of this picture book may be assisted by CHATGPT. b. The illustrations of this picture book may be assisted in drawing by CHATGPT. Students can create a picture book with audio-visual effects. a. The video of this picture book may be assisted by AI software for video creation. b. The voice of this picture book may be generated by AI software. Students can create an interactive picture book with immersive key plot points. a. The 3D space models inside this picture book are assisted in creation by AI.
goal.ch: AI在文化內容產業的使用已經蓬勃發展。AI在創意鏈的使用，例如文化創造、再製、傳布、接近方式都有新的做法。除了許多音樂、電影、文學家使用機器學習(machine learning)來創作作品，也讓大眾非專業藝術工作者，開啟藝術創作的機會，降低過往 的技術門檻。同時AI的演算法協助創作者分析消費端的需求與使用行為，讓作品可以被看到的機會增加。AI技術的運用，的確為人文科系學生，帶來許多新的發展機會。 從以上的個案可以看出：藝術、歷史、文學、文字、語言、影像、聲音與音樂、人類情緒與感情表達等等，都是這些創作技術所需要的重要能力，也是人文科系的強項。 本課程將從AI與文化內容產業上的使用案例出發，交錯於產業類型、技術介紹、實例運用幾種分類方式，結合案例分析與案例實作的教學手法，希望讓同學可以對於當代人工智慧在文化內容產業上的角色與運用有更多了解。 老師希望的課程最終目標 1. 學生能做出一個可印刷出來的繪本或地方文化追蹤 a. 這個繪本的劇情可能是由 CHATGPT輔助 b. 這個繪本的圖片可能是由 CHATGPT協助繪製 2. 學生能做出一個具有聲光效果的繪本 a. 這個繪本的影片可能是由 AI軟體協助做影片 b. 這個繪本的語音可能是由 AI軟體生成的語音 3. 學生能做出一個能進入體驗關鍵劇情的繪本 a. 這個繪本裡面的3D空間模型是由AI協助製作
